data.comment: The first-half is under way at Stade du Pays de Charleroi - Liege kick-off to start the match.
The first-half is under way at Stade du Pays de Charleroi - Liege kick-off to start the match.
Kostas Laifis (Liege) has received a first yellow card.
Charleroi take a 1-0 lead thanks to Dorian Dessoleil.
Alexandre Boucaut blows to start the second-half. Charleroi with the kick-off.
Goal! Charleroi extend their lead to 2-0 through Shamar Nicholson.
Charleroi's Marco Ilaimaharitra has been booked in Charleroi.
The away team have replaced Selim Amallah with Felipe Avenatti. This is the first substitution made today by Michel Preud'homme.
Mergim Vojvoda (Liege) has received a yellow card from Alexandre Boucaut.
Michel Preud'homme is making the team's second substitution at Stade du Pays de Charleroi with Aleksandar Boljevic replacing Mehdi Carcela-Gonz√°lez.
Kayembe is replacing Ali Gholizadeh for the home team.
Liege make their third substitution with Eden Shamir replacing Mergim Vojvoda.
Frank Tsadjout is replacing Mamadou Fall for Charleroi at Stade du Pays de Charleroi.
Modou Diagne is on a sub for Marco Ilaimaharitra for Charleroi.
That's full-time at Stade du Pays de Charleroi. The final score is 2-0.
[10] ([11]) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
